Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute near 111th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Drive buses temp. rerouted NB: 111th, Marshfield, 112th Pl and Loomis; SB 111th, Racine, 112th and Vincennes: near 111th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 111th/Vincennes, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via 111th, Marshfield, 112th Place and Loomis 

Southbound buses will operate via 111th, Racine, 112th and Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.
